body.name: KOHLER K-3819-0 Memoirs Stately Two-Piece Elongated Toilet, Left-Hand Trip Lever, Comfort-Height Toilet, Chair Height Toilet, 1.6 GPF, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 35 mins
features: Two-Piece Elongated Toilet: Memoirs toilet set features chair-height seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults; combination consists of the K-4380 bowl and the K-4642 1.6 gpf (6.0 lpf) tank with left-hand polished chrome trip lever, White

AquaPiston Technology: Durable AquaPiston canister design has 90% less exposed seal material than a 3" flapper for leak-free performance; the light-touch, single flush canister allows water to flow into the bowl from all sides (360°), increasing the power and effectiveness of the flush
Sophisticated Design: Combines the clean and crisp lines of the Stately design with the added rounded details of the Classic style which resemble crown molding to create a sophisticated bathroom look
Effortless Install: Floor-mount toilet set with three-bolt quick-connect installation; requires a standard 12" (305 mm) rough-in; toilet seat and supply line sold separately

Elongated Toilet Set: Coordinates with other products in the Memoirs collection with Stately design; recommend for use with K-5588 Purefresh Elongated toilet seat or K-4108 C3TM-230 Elongated bidet toilet seat with remote control
body.description: Product Description The sophistication of traditional design serves as the inspiration for the Memoirs collection. With its rich detailing, this suite of products echoes the stylized lines of historically renowned furniture and architectural design. Two styles offer different dignified interpretations - the clean, crisp lines of the Stately design, and the added rounded detail of the Classic style, which resembles crown molding. With fixtures and faucets available, the extensive Memoirs collection can accommodate both large and small bath and powder rooms. From the Manufacturer The sophistication of traditional design serves as the inspiration for the Memoirs Suite. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Install The DryLock Fast Install System makes no-leak installations fast and foolproof. You only need a socket wrench to secure the tank to bowl and there’s no need for bolt holes in the tank. Class Five Flushing Technology Class Five flushing technology is designed for extraordinary bulk-flushing performance. Its large flush valve allows the rapid release of water combined with a direct-fed jet to keep your bowl sparkling clean. The canister flush valve allows water to flow into the bowl from all sides, increasing the power and effectiveness of the flush. The durable canister design has 90% less exposed seal material than a 3” flapper for leak-free performance. The universal red seal lasts longer because only a small area is exposed to tank water.

I spoke to Mary , she said I was good then 2 more requests…. I’m on 6 emails…

reviews.reviewText: We've ordered twice now, and it has come broken both times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did not receive the toilet seat with the order
reviews.reviewText: The Kohler toilet arrived on time and was recently installed by my plumber. There was no seat included, although the pictured product shows the toilet seat. I would like to be shipped the appropriate seat or some financial compensation for me to buy one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, excellent Amazon customer service
reviews.reviewText: This toilet was standard excellent Kohler quality and was installed easily by our plumbers. Even greater thanks goes to Amazon. When we notified them that the tank cover arrived cracked in half (the rest of the toilet was fine), they immediately gave us a generous concession on the price that was way more than enough to buy a new cover. Thanks, Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toilet, but beware of missing seat and install kit...
reviews.reviewText: We had this toilet in our guest bathroom, and in renovating another house, decided to buy the same unit again as I have NEVER had to plunge this toilet, and it is a really beautiful design. A few things to consider, however. Since the base is so large, you are going to be more prone to experiencing an unlevel toilet, as the wide base exposes more floor area. If you have a tiled floor, you may have to shim in a few places to get it not to rock if your tile isn't spot on perfect.And regards to the seller of this toilet. It is SUPPOSED to come with a seat. Ours did not, and did not find out until install day. I purchased the replacement at Lowes (a whopping $42). Amazon, being an awesome company, credited me back the money I spend on the toilet seat. The unit that arrived did NOT come with a wax seal kit. The previous memoirs toilet we purchase did. I don't know if Kohler stopped providing them, or this was accidental.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought two but had to return them
reviews.reviewText: Bought two but had to return them, I did not have the code required clearance to install an elongated toilet.My hall bath does have this model and I finally had to change the seal on the bottom, not difficult but keep going through the you-tube videos until you see one just like yours, $12 is ultra cheap repair compared to calling a plumber.
Beautiful toilet -easy to install. Very solid. I like the height, and the graceful lines on it.
well made toilet. very easy to install. love the height.
